pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: この世界の教育にはがっかりしてしまう。
lessons.indonesian: Education in this world disappoints me.

lessons.japanese: この世界の教育にはがっかりしてしまう。
lessons.indonesian: Education in this world disappoints me.

lessons.japanese: 君のレポートにはがっかりしたよ。
lessons.indonesian: I was disappointed with your paper.

lessons.japanese: リンダはひどくがっかりしたので、急にわっと泣き出した。
lessons.indonesian: Such was Linda's disappointment that she burst into tears.

lessons.japanese: もしおばあちゃんが来なければ子ども達はがっかりするだろう。
lessons.indonesian: If Grandma doesn't come, the children will be disappointed.

lessons.japanese: ボーナスがいつもより少なかったのでがっかりした。
lessons.indonesian: I was disappointed to see that my bonus was a bit less than I was expecting.

lessons.japanese: それにはかなりがっかりした。
lessons.indonesian: I found it something of a disappointment.

lessons.japanese: その知らせを聞いて大変がっかりした。
lessons.indonesian: I was very disappointed at the news.

lessons.japanese: その知らせを聞いて少なからずがっかりした。
lessons.indonesian: I was not a little disappointed at the news.
